response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to me, but I understand its potential worth to you and believe it could be a significant asset for your endeavors. Considering its unique features and the impact it can have on your business, I am offering it to you for $9,500. I believe this price reflects both the value of the product and provides you with a considerable advantage over the market rate. I look forward to hearing your response and the possibility of bringing this product into your possession.", "product_price": 9500}
